```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
download.file("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vSaerGnn1tDQfgiyJRl7jnn1Au7Ev6Qt7BwMpl53ZgzAyMnANQfog9y4es4ZExlX5tjEgl0mPIyTGcP/pub?gid=480043959&single=true&output=csv", destfile = "raw-data/trains.csv")
trains <- read_csv("raw-data/trains.csv", 
                   col_names = TRUE,
                   col_types = cols(male = col_int(),
                                    republican = col_int(),
                                    white = col_int(),
                                    income = col_double(),
                                    treatment = col_int(),
                                    attitude = col_double()))
trains
trains %>% 
  group_by(treatment) %>% 
  summarize(meanAttitude = mean(attitude))
```
